features.hero_title: Customizable home screen based on your lifestyle

about.history_title: Enjoy sports, movies, TV shows & more with SkyLo
about.history_description: SkyLo began with a belief: the future belongs to those who live digitally. But what if the digital experience moved even faster? SkyLo isn't just about staying connected—it's about living ahead. Whether you're streaming, gaming, or creating, SkyLo is built for limitless ambition.

community.title: Join the fun with your friends and thousands of SkyLo users
community.membership_description: Free SkyLo membership card made exclusively for SkyLo customers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.why_download_answer: SkyLo is the best digital lifestyle superapp in the country with unlimited entertainment and the best 4G network in the country.
